description:
On the night of the summer festival, Ushio`s shadow appears before Shinpei. Unlike the other shadows he has encountered, this one behaves like the real Ushio. Shinpei hides Ushio`s shadow from Mio and Sou, who are alarmed by the shadows.
Later, while Shinpei is on the way to Hiruko to meet with Sou and the others, Mio`s shadow finds him again.
Source: Disney+
